title: Fullmetal Alchemist Blind Alchemist
alternative_title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood Specials, 鋼の錬金術師
description: The DVD/Blu-ray Disc of “Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood” volume 1 was announced to be released on August 26th. Along with episode 1 and 2, an extra episode “Moumoku no Renkinjutsushi (Blind Alchemist)” will be included in the volume.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Magic>, <Genre -> Military>, <Genre -> Shounen>]
